<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes organizations that match the supplied query criteria. This is a bulk, destructive operation intended for administrative cleanup after you have verified the target set.

**Workflow Example**
1. Preview matches with [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organizations-by-query-get).
2. Call [DELETE /api/v1.0/organizations/query](/docs/api/organizations/delete-organizations-by-query) to remove the matched organizations.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Provide filters or query constraints to scope the deletion.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated and should be used with caution.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
